memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry, fsal_accessflags_t access_type, hash_table_t *ht, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus, int use_mutex)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_access_sw

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_access: checks for an entry accessibility.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry pointer for the fs object to be checked.
[IN] flags used to describe the kind of access to be checked.
[INOUT] hash table used for the cache.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] a flag to tell if mutex are to be used or not.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if operation is a success
CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR if allocation error occured when validating the entry
any other values show an unauthorized access.

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry, fsal_accessflags_t access_type, hash_table_t *ht, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_access_no_mutex

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_access_no_mutex: checks for an entry accessibility. No mutex management

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry pointer for the fs object to be checked.
[IN] flags used to describe the kind of access to be checked.
[INOUT] hash table used for the cache.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if operation is a success
CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR if allocation error occured when validating the entry
